text: For from the rising of the sun even unto the going down of the same my name <FI>shall be<Fi> great among the Gentiles; and in every place incense <FI>shall be<Fi> offered unto my name, and a pure offering: for my name <FI>shall be<Fi> great among the Gentiles, saith Jehovah of hosts.
name: Malachi 1:11
